CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c, "Open Banking pay-ins" ), "OBPI; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "Open Banking pay-outs" ), "OBPO; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "Card pay-ins" ), "CCPI; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "Card pay-outs" ), "CCPO; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "Payment links" ), "PMLK; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "Sign in via Bank" ), "SIVB; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "LTV prediction" ), "PLTV; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product__c , "Other (specify)" ), "OTHR; ",null )
CustomField.label: Product Code
